name: Betsy Gamrat
bio: Betsy Gamrat is a software engineer at SitePen, Inc. She has been using and enjoying Dojo since 2008. Her blog is web-notes.

name: Brian Arnold
bio: Brian Arnold is a software engineer at SitePen, Inc. He has a lovely wife, two cute dogs, is an active member of (and presenter at) Webuquerque, and ranks among the top 3% of fake guitarists in Rock Band.

name: Bryan Forbes
bio: Bryan Forbes has used Dojo since 2006 and became a Dojo committer shortly thereafter. He rewrote Dojo's effects system for the 0.3 release and currently maintains the DataGrid. He is a senior software engineer at SitePen, Inc.

name: David Walsh
bio: David Walsh is a software engineer at SitePen, Inc. that blogs frequently about Dojo at his blog.

name: Kris Zyp
bio: Kris Zyp is a Dojo committer and senior software engineer at SitePen, Inc.

name: Matt Kleczka
bio: Matt Kleczka is a software engineer at SitePen, Inc.

name: Sam Foster
bio: Sam Foster is a Dojo committer and web engineer at Mozilla. He loves to make stuff.

name: Tom Trenka
bio: Tom Trenka is one of the original Dojo committers, owner of many DojoX modules and a Senior Software Engineer at SitePen, Inc. He is also a former university lecturer and an accomplished musician.
